EX4.8
```{r}
letter_grades <- c("C", "B-", "B", "B+", "A-", "A", "A+")
numeric_grades <- c(2, 2.5, 3, 3.5, 4, 4.5, 5)
studentGrades <- c('B','A','A+','B+','A-','B','B-','B','A+','B+','C','B-','B-','B','C','C','B+','B','B+','B')

studentLetterGrades <- {
  step1 <- as.numeric(
    factor(
      studentGrades,
      levels = letter_grades
  )
  )

  step2 =
      factor(
      (step1 + 3) * 0.5 ,
      levels = numeric_grades
    )
}
step1
step2
c(2, 2.5, 3, 3.5, 4, 4.5, 5)[step1]
```
